General.Name: Panin Financial Tbk
General.Description: PT Panin Financial Tbk provides business consulting, management, and administration services to the general public in Indonesia. It also offers life insurance products, including death, whole life, annuity, endowment, endowment combine, universal life, unit-linked, personal accident, and health. The company was formerly known as PT Panin Life Tbk and changed its name to PT Panin Financial Tbk in 2010. PT Panin Financial Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Panin Financial Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Paninvest Tbk.
